styles.header: w-full bg-white p-6 flex items-center justify-between mb-12
styles.h6: text-lg font-medium text-[#6B7280] mb-2 uppercase tracking-wide
styles.button: inline-flex items-center gap-2 px-6 py-3 bg-[#3B82F6] text-white rounded-md hover:bg-[#2563EB] transition
styles.input: w-full px-4 py-2 border border-[#D1D5DB] rounded-md text-[#111827] focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#3B82F6] focus:border-[#3B82F6]
styles.textarea: w-full px-4 py-2 border border-[#D1D5DB] rounded-md text-[#111827] focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#3B82F6] focus:border-[#3B82F6]
styles.select: w-full px-4 py-2 border border-[#D1D5DB] rounded-md text-[#111827] focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#3B82F6] focus:border-[#3B82F6]
styles.label: text-sm font-medium mb-1 block text-[#374151]
styles.th: px-4 py-2 border border-[#E5E7EB] bg-[#3B82F6] text-white text-left
styles.blockquote: pl-6 border-l-4 border-[#3B82F6] italic text-[#374151] my-6 bg-[#EFF6FF] p-4 rounded
styles.code: font-mono text-sm bg-[#F3F4F6] text-[#EF4444] px-2 py-1 rounded
styles.pre: font-mono text-sm bg-[#F3F4F6] text-[#EF4444] p-4 rounded overflow-x-auto mb-6
styles.aside: bg-[#F3F4F6] rounded-lg p-5 border border-[#E5E7EB] shadow-sm text-[#374151] mb-10
styles.footer: w-full text-center text-[#6B7280] py-6 border-t border-[#E5E7EB]
styles.details: mb-4 bg-white border border-[#E5E7EB] rounded-md p-4
styles.progress: block w-full h-2 bg-[#E5E7EB] rounded-lg overflow-hidden
styles.dialog: bg-white p-6 rounded-md shadow-xl max-w-lg mx-auto
styles.datalist: block w-full px-4 py-2 border border-[#D1D5DB] rounded-md bg-white
styles.output: inline-block px-2 py-1 bg-[#F3F4F6] text-[#111827] rounded
